did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photo albums from the Oberleithner Company

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Photo album titles: Linen-and Cotton-Weaving Factory Bleaching and Finishing Works of Ed. Oberleithner's Sons, Mahr.-Schonberg Vienna ; Spinning Mill of Oberleithner & Co., Mahr.-Schonberg, Hannsdorf, Halbseit. Factory name in one of the photos is "Leinen und Baumwollwaren Fabrik von Ed. Oberleithners Sohne" 1817, labeled as Head-Offices, Mahr.-Schonberg.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Oberleithner Company Photograph Albums #5753 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
